fig.label: Figure 1
fig.sd-panel: SQR = sulfide:quinone oxidoreductase; TR = thiosulfate reductase; SDO = sulfur deoxygenase or ETHE1; SO = sulfite oxidase or SUOX; TST = thiosulfate sulfurtransferase or rhodanase.

sd-panel.p: Sqr mRNA levels (A, B, C), in cerebrum (A, D), kidneys (B, E, G) and muscle (C, F, H) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice.

SQR protein levels (D, E, F) in cerebrum (A, D), kidneys (B, E, G) and muscle (C, F, H) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice. Note that SQRwestern-blots were performed in isolated cerebralmitochondria due to the low levels of this protein in cerebrum. In kidneys and muscle the western-blots were performed in tissue homogenates.
SQR activity (G, H) in kidneys (B, E, G) and muscle (C, F, H) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice.

fig.label: Figure 3
fig.sd-panel: Levels of CoQ10 in fibroblasts of controls (C) and patients (P1-4) with primary CoQ10 deficiency (A).
Levels of SQR protein in fibroblasts of controls (C) and patients (P1-4) with primary CoQ10 deficiency cultured without (vehicle) and with 5μM of CoQ10 (+ CoQ10) during 1 day or 7 days (B).

sd-panel.p: Total CoQ levels (CoQ9 + CoQ10) in kidneys (C) and muscle (D) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9R239X + ubiquinol-10 (Q10H2) mice.
Levels of SQR protein in kidneys (E) and muscle (F) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9R239X + ubiquinol-10 (Q10H2) mice.
TST protein levels in cerebrum (A), kidneys (B) and muscle (C) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice.
TST activity in cerebrum (D), kidneys (E) and muscle (F) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice.
ETHE1 (SDO) protein levels in cerebrum (G), kidneys (H) and muscle (I) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice.
SUOX protein levels in cerebrum (J), kidneys (K) and muscle (L) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice.

fig.label: Figure 5
fig.sd-panel: Quantification of sulfide levels in cerebrum and kidneys of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice (A).

sd-panel.p: Qualitative measurement of hydrogen sulfide in cerebrum and kidneys of Coq9+/+ and Coq9R239X mice (B).

fig.label: Figure 6

sd-panel.p: Total GSH in cytosol and mitochondria of cerebrum of Coq9+/+ and Coq9R239X mice(A).

fig.sd-panel: Cytosolic GPx and GRd activities in cerebrum of Coq9+/+ and Coq9R239X mice (B).

sd-panel.p: Levels of GPx4 (C) and GRd (D) protein in cerebral homogenate of Coq9+/+ and Coq9R239X mice.
Levels of L-Glutamate (L-Glu), N-Acetyl-Glutamate (NacGlu), L-Tryptophan (L-Trp), 5HIAA, N-Acetyl-Tryptophan (NALT), L-Tyrosine (L-Tyr) in cerebrum of Coq9+/+ and Coq9R239X mice (E).

fig.sd-panel: Biosynthetic pathway of GSH, serotonin and catecholamine (F).

sd-panel.p: SQR (A) and TST (B) protein levels in human skin fibroblasts supplemented with the H2S donor GYY4137.
TST protein level in kidneys (C) and cerebrum (D) of Coq9+/+ mice supplemented with the H2S donor GYY4137.
Levels of neurotransmitters in cerebrum of Coq9+/+ mice supplemented with the H2S donor GYY4137 (E).

fig.label: Figure 8

sd-panel.p: COX activity in cerebrum, kidneys and muscle (A) of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice.

fig.sd-panel: Images COX histochemistry (B) in gastrocnemious of Coq9+/+, Coq9R239X and Coq9Q95X mice; scale bars: 100 μm.

fig.label: Figure 9
fig.sd-panel: Systolic, diastolic and mean blood pressure in Coq9+/+ and Coq9R239X mice (A).
Heart rate in Coq9+/+ and Coq9R239X mice (B). **P < 0.01; Coq9R239X mice versus Coq9+/+ mice (t test; n = 5 for each group).
